summary:
Passionate Data Scientist & BI Engineer specializing in building scalable data infrastructure and predictive analytics. I design end-to-end pipelines that process terabytes of telemetry data, develop ML models that improve system performance by 20%, and create real-time dashboards that empower data-driven decision making.

Expert in Python, SQL, Azure, and Power BI with a track record of automating critical analytics workflows and delivering measurable business impact. From anomaly detection to forecasting models, I transform raw data into strategic insights that drive operational excellence and competitive advantage.

experience.title: AI Developer
description: ‚Ä¢ Building telemetry-driven analytics infrastructure to track system uptime, latency, and error propagation across distributed services.
‚Ä¢ Automating data ingestion and transformation pipelines (Python, SQL, Azure Data Factory), handling structured and semi-structured data at scale.
‚Ä¢ Deploying forecasting models (XGBoost) for usage and capacity trends, improving prediction accuracy by 20% and enabling proactive scaling.
‚Ä¢ Integrating anomaly-detection scripts for performance metrics, reducing manual debugging time by 45%.
‚Ä¢ Designing and deploying real-time Power BI dashboards with automated alerts, enhancing visibility of operational KPIs by 60%.

experience.title: Search Language Model Developer
description: Developed an advanced semantic search model using LLM language model, enhancing search accuracy and user satisfaction by accurately capturing user intent and delivering relevant results.
Selected LLM for its efficiency and semantic understanding capabilities, fine-tuned with domain-specific data, and implemented to improve semantic processing of queries.

Established a benchmark using metrics such as precision, recall, Mean Average Precision (MAP), and Normalized Discounted Cumulative Gain (NDCG), demonstrating approximately 30% higher accuracy than the existing search solution.
Notably excelled in handling complex queries requiring deeper semantic understanding.
Skills: GPT, GPT-4, LLM, Semantic Search, Machine Learning, Data Analysis, Python, Azure Databricks

experience.title: Packaged App Development Analyst
description: Spearheaded data analysis using Python, leading to the implementation of new strategies, improving tool performance by 10%.
Utilized Power BI to develop efficient data models, reducing processing time by 60%.
Awarded 'Gamification Recognition' for outstanding Power Automate idea at a Microsoft event.
Skills: Data Modeling, Master Data Management, Power BI, Power Automate, Python, Data Analysis
Automated processes with Python, achieving a 20% reduction in processing time and 30% improvement in image-processing speed.
Collaborated on a machine learning model development for IoT anomaly detection, enhancing accuracy by 10% using Azure DPS, Stream Analytics, Blob Storage, and Central IoT.
Skills: Microsoft Azure, Data Modeling, Python, Machine Learning, IoT, Azure Stream Analytics, Azure Blob Storage.
Developed a single-page application with Angular, attracting 100,000 unique visitors in the first month for a client project.
Implemented multiprocessing in Python Flask for backend development and SQL for a logistics company, improving server processing efficiency.
Skills: Microsoft Azure, Data Engineering, Angular, Python, Flask, SQL, Full-Stack Development

education.degree: Master of Science in Data Science (MSDS)

publications.title: Intelligent Car
publications.authors: R. Suryakailash, P. Rathinakumar, S. Atchaya and L Sripriyadharshini
publications.journal: Journal of Physics: Conference Series, Volume 1804, International Conference of Modern Applications on Information and Communication Technology (ICMAICT) 22-23 October 2020

Semantic Product Search Platform
Featured
AI-Powered Search Engine

qjump.AI
Jun 2025 ‚Äì Present
Developed an advanced semantic search platform for products that leverages LLM-based embeddings to transform traditional keyword search into intelligent semantic search. The system achieves 35% better search results compared to traditional like and contains search methods by understanding the semantic meaning and context of search queries.

Key Contributions:
‚Ä¢
Designed and implemented semantic search architecture using LLM embeddings for product search
‚Ä¢
Embedded product descriptions and search queries into semantic vector space for intelligent matching
‚Ä¢
Integrated vector database for efficient storage and retrieval of embedded product data
‚Ä¢
Built React frontend with modern UI/UX for seamless search experience
‚Ä¢
Developed FastAPI backend with optimized search algorithms and API endpoints
‚Ä¢
Deployed full-stack application on VPS using Docker for containerization and scalability
‚Ä¢
Achieved 35% improvement in search result relevance compared to traditional keyword search

Planning and Mission Effectiveness Demographic Data History
Capstone
Archdiocese of Seattle (MSDS 25.2 Capstone Project)

Seattle University
Jan 2025 ‚Äì Jun 2025
Partnered with the Archdiocese of Seattle to support the Partners in the Gospel initiative through data-driven pastoral planning. Analyzed historical and current data across 136 parishes to uncover demographic and engagement trends.

Key Contributions:
‚Ä¢
Integrated parish sacramental, financial, household, and Mass attendance data with U.S. Census demographics into a unified SQLite database
‚Ä¢
ARIMA forecasting predicted 1.44% decline in parish households, enabling proactive resource planning
‚Ä¢
OLS & Lasso regression identified key drivers of young adult engagement
‚Ä¢
GIS mapping identified areas with high Spanish-speaking populations but no Spanish-language Masses
‚Ä¢
Delivered visualizations and dashboards highlighting community gaps and engagement opportunities
Outcome:
Delivered data-informed insights, predictive models, and visual dashboards to empower the Archdiocese in resource allocation, outreach, and strategic planning.

NASA Space App (My Sleep Tool)
Featured
NASA Space Apps Challenge
2024
A comprehensive tool designed for astronauts to calculate BMR, track required calories, and monitor nutrition. The application provides nutritious food recommendations when nutrition levels are low, tracks calories consumed and burned during workouts, and intelligently schedules sleep based on 15 health and sleep quality parameters.

Key Contributions:
‚Ä¢
Developed BMR calculation system using NASA-qualified formulas for accurate metabolic rate assessment
‚Ä¢
Implemented nutrition tracking and recommendation system that suggests nutritious foods when levels are low
‚Ä¢
Built calorie tracking system to monitor calories consumed and burned during daily workouts
‚Ä¢
Created intelligent sleep scheduling algorithm that considers 15 health and sleep quality parameters
‚Ä¢
Designed comprehensive dashboard with data visualization for monitoring astronaut health metrics

Hourly Load Prediction for New Hampshire Using ML
Seattle University
Oct 2023 ‚Äì Nov 2023
Developed predictive models for hourly electricity demand in New Hampshire by leveraging machine learning techniques and weather data. Achieved 97% accuracy in predicting hourly electricity demand.

Key Contributions:
‚Ä¢
Utilized historical data spanning 2020-2022 from ISO New England
‚Ä¢
Engineered features including temperature interactions, day classifications, and month variations
‚Ä¢
Employed Random Forest and Linear Regression models for predictive analysis
‚Ä¢
Identified strong seasonal trends and correlations between weather variables and energy consumption
‚Ä¢
Achieved 97% accuracy using Random Forest model
Outcome:
Optimized insights for energy providers and consumers, fostering operational efficiency and sustainable resource utilization.

Warehouse Visualization
Capstone
Real-Time Industry Project

Nokia
Jan 2020 ‚Äì Mar 2020
Developed a comprehensive warehouse visualization system for efficient inventory management and operations optimization. The system consists of three integrated components: Pick by Light, Verification System, and HAIPs (Human-AI Interaction Platforms). This real-time industry project successfully visualized all warehouse components and significantly increased factory production efficiency, proving especially beneficial during the COVID-19 lockdown period.

Key Contributions:
‚Ä¢
Designed and implemented Pick by Light system for efficient component picking and assembly operations
‚Ä¢
Developed verification system to ensure accuracy and quality control in warehouse operations
‚Ä¢
Integrated HAIPs (Human-AI Interaction Platforms) for enhanced human-machine collaboration
‚Ä¢
Created comprehensive visualization system that tracked and displayed all warehouse components in real-time
‚Ä¢
Optimized warehouse operations leading to increased production efficiency during critical periods
Outcome:
Successfully delivered a real-time warehouse visualization system that integrated Pick by Light, Verification System, and HAIPs components. The system significantly increased factory production efficiency and proved invaluable during the COVID-19 lockdown, enabling continued operations with improved inventory management and operational optimization.

I-CAR (Intelligent Car)
Capstone
Published in Journal of Physics: Conference Series, Volume 1804

SRM University
Jul 2016 ‚Äì Nov 2016
INTELLIGENT CAR (ICAR) is a car developed on eye-tracking software using a camera. The ICAR is the first Intelligent car that works with eye control and automatic driving. You can ride a car and move around wherever you want. The car drives Right, left, forward and stop using your eyes with the help of camera and coding. The main advantage is the car drives without any hassle in the roadways because of sensors i.e without any accidents/hitting any objects. Physically challenged people can also travel easily by I-Car, they need not call any person for help on the roads or depend on anyone to move from one place to another.

Key Contributions:
‚Ä¢
Developed the first intelligent car system with eye-tracking control using camera technology
‚Ä¢
Implemented automatic driving capabilities with sensor-based obstacle detection and prevention
‚Ä¢
Created eye-controlled navigation system (Right, Left, Forward, Stop) for hands-free operation
‚Ä¢
Designed system to assist physically challenged individuals with independent mobility
‚Ä¢
Published research paper in Journal of Physics: Conference Series (ICMAICT 2020)
Outcome:
Successfully developed and published the first intelligent car system with eye-tracking control, enabling hands-free navigation and independent mobility for physically challenged individuals. The research paper was published in the Journal of Physics: Conference Series, Volume 1804, with 595+ total downloads, contributing to the advancement of assistive technology and autonomous vehicle research.
